content: {"name": "City of Greenbelt Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "* The location August \u2013 June is 15 Crescent Road, Greenbelt, MD 20770 in the parking lot near the circle.\n* In July the distribution will be in the lower parking lot of 25 Crescent Road near the pool.", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "25 Crescent Rd", "address_2": null, "city": "Greenbelt", "state_province": "MD", "postal_code": "20770", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.000501, "longitude": -76.877449}, "phones": [{"number": "(301) 219-6650", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Walk-ins accepted"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Drive-Thru Only"}]}
